pectoralMass.name: PECTORAL MASS
pectoralMass.description: Your totally big, meaty pectorals! You're not fat at all...'

graphicTee.name: GRAPHIC TEE
graphicTee.description: A t-shirt that says 'Normal people scare me'

barrelWithSuspenders.name: BARREL (with suspenders)
barrelWithSuspenders.description: An empty barrel that sort of covers your torso and legs. Smells like whisky too!

leatherArmor.name: LEATHER ARMOR
leatherArmor.description: The finest in leather, fitted with a tight top, codpiece, cat o' nine tails... (uh, are you sure this is actually armor?)

milaneseArmor.name: MILANESE ARMOR
milaneseArmor.description: A classic suit of armor. Looks kind of like a Renaissance-era Robocop

blackPlateArmor.name: BLACK PLATE ARMOR
blackPlateArmor.description: Literally a giant black dinner plate. Deceptively protective.

nokiaMail.name: NOKIA MAIL
nokiaMail.description: A Nokia branded mail. No, not like an email... more like a chainmail. But Nokia.
